subject: p10715477
History: AFib, recent aortic replacement, assess for pneumonia.
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest were obtained. Midline sternotomy wires are again noted. The left IJ central venous catheter has been removed. There is improved aeration in the lung bases as compared with the prior exam. The heart is markedly enlarged, which appears grossly stable compared with prior exam. There is no sign of pneumonia or overt CHF. Bony structures are intact. Aortic calcifications noted.
Impression: Stable cardiomegaly without signs of pneumonia or CHF.
